availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel Gordon Buckner (Christian County, KY, prov govt conv rep )

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Francis W. Buckner and Sarah A. Gordon Buckner. Married to Katie S. Woldridge Buckner in Trigg County, Kentucky, on March 26, 1857. Father of Thomas W. Buckner, Frank W. Buckner, and Joe C. Buckner. Resident in Christian County in 1850. Farmer in Christian County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861. Farmer in Christian County in 1863.
